## Description {#details}

The AMDGPU TargetMachine interface definition for hw codegen targets.

<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Check if a pass is enabled given \\p Opt option. The option always</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// overrides defaults if explicitly used. Otherwise its default will</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// minimum.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpupassconfig/#a16f2b92989c6760a2447933b3c78a755"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpupassconfig/#a16f2b92989c6760a2447933b3c78a755">isPassEnabled</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/opt">cl::opt&lt;bool&gt;</a> &amp;Opt,</span></CodeLine>
